description: Hashicorp Vault with Integrated storage (Raft) Metrics

panels.description: This panel should show no activity in a stable cluster. Some leadership transition events are expectedsuch as during cluster upgrades. Unexpected events may indicate an issue with cluster stability
panels.title: Election Events

panels.description: Time it takes for a server to apply Raft entries to the internal state machine.
panels.title: Raft FSM apply

panels.description: Time to write logmark in flightand start replication to followers
panels.title: Raft Dispatch Log

panels.description: The time it takes for a Raft transaction to be replicated to a quorum of followers
panels.title: Raft Append Entries

panels.description: Time difference between when a message was first passed into Raft and when the resulting commit took place on the leader
panels.title: Raft Commit Time

panels.description: Measures the time since the leader was last able to contact the follower nodes when checking its leader lease
panels.title: Leader Last Contacted

panels.description: This measures the time it takes to replicate log entries to followers. This is a general indicator of the load pressure on the Consul serversas well as the performance of the communication between the servers.
panels.title: Log replication from leader to servers

panels.description: Number of Raft transactions - general indicator of the write load on the servers.
panels.title: Raft Apply Count

title: Hashicorp Vault - Integrated storage (Raft)
